title: IndyCar Racing (1993) (PC Game) (HereticXS)
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IndyCar Racing (1993) (PC Game)
Released by HereticXS - specializing in authentic releases of old-school games.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This release was ripped from an authentic physical CD of the original MS-DOS
media. It includes bin/cue CD image files of the original installation CD.

This release includes LaunchBox (and DOSBox) which will allow you to easily play
the game on modern Windows PCs. No configuration or installation is necessary.
Simply run LaunchBox.exe and then double-click on the game to play.

IndyCar Racing is Papyrus' second racing game, four years after the release of
Indianapolis 500. With an official license, all the real track names and designs
are available (eight in total), with authentic sponsors and logos. Other
features include multiple TV-type replays, a comprehensive garage and setup
routine and breakaway parts when making contact with other cars. This is a pure
open-wheel simulation, based on the American races, with realistic car handling
and room for racing techniques based on grip, ideal racing lines, and throttle-
to-brake interaction.
